title: emmatham sammatam
sahitya:
emmatham sammatam ellArukkum podu matham idaya smayOgam ellAm idil EkamE


anupallavi

  nanmaiyum tiNmaiyum uNmaiyum vaNmaiyum nAmanat-tUimaiyum jnAlat-tiruppaNiyum


caraNam    bhaktiyil islAm paNiyinil kristu parivilE buddhan arivilE hindu
shuddha sutantara samattuva yOgi shUzhuyir nAnena vAzhum vivEki
